org.demoiselle.signer.core

Interface CertificateLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CertificateLoaderImpl

    public interface CertificateLoader
    Defines the basic methods for loading a certificate depending on the storage format.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      KeyStore getKeyStore()
      Returns the KeyStore used by CertificateLoader.
      X509Certificate load(File file)
      Obtains the certificate from a file, defined by ICP-BRASIL with the name A1.
      X509Certificate loadFromToken()
      Obtain the certificate from a Token or Smartcard, defined by ICP-BRASIL with the name A3.
      X509Certificate loadFromToken(String pinNumber)
      When a PIN (Personal Identification Number) was informed, obtain the certificate from a Token or Smartcard, defined by ICP-BRASIL with the name A3.
      X509Certificate loadFromToken(String pinNumber, String alias)
      When a PIN (Personal Identification Number) and Alias was informed, obtain the certificate from a Token or Smartcard, defined by ICP-BRASIL with the name A3.
      void setKeyStore(KeyStore keyStore)
      Associate a previously existing keystore.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        X509Certificate load(File file)
              throws CertificateCoreException
        Obtains the certificate from a file, defined by ICP-BRASIL with the name A1.
        Parameters:
        file - The file that contains the certificate.
        Returns:
        the certificate information in X509Certificate format.
        Throws:
        CertificateCoreException - in case of problem in loading.

      • loadFromToken

        X509Certificate loadFromToken()
                       throws CertificateCoreException
        Obtain the certificate from a Token or Smartcard, defined by ICP-BRASIL with the name A3.
        Returns:
        the certificate information in X509Certificate format.
        Throws:
        CertificateCoreException - in case of problem in loading.

      • loadFromToken

        X509Certificate loadFromToken(String pinNumber)
                       throws CertificateCoreException
        When a PIN (Personal Identification Number) was informed, obtain the certificate from a Token or Smartcard, defined by ICP-BRASIL with the name A3.
        Parameters:
        pinNumber - personal identification number.
        Returns:
        the certificate information in X509Certificate format.
        Throws:
        CertificateCoreException - in case of problem in loading.

      • loadFromToken

        X509Certificate loadFromToken(String pinNumber,
                              String alias)
                       throws CertificateCoreException
        When a PIN (Personal Identification Number) and Alias was informed, obtain the certificate from a Token or Smartcard, defined by ICP-BRASIL with the name A3.
        Parameters:
        pinNumber - a PIN (Personal Identification Number).
        alias - desired alias.
        Returns:
        the certificate information in X509Certificate format.
        Throws:
        CertificateCoreException - in case of problem in loading.

      • setKeyStore

        void setKeyStore(KeyStore keyStore)
          throws CertificateCoreException
        Associate a previously existing keystore.
        Parameters:
        keyStore - an existing KeyStore.
        Throws:
        CertificateCoreException - if is not possible to set the keystore.

      • getKeyStore

        KeyStore getKeyStore()
              throws CertificateCoreException
        Returns the KeyStore used by CertificateLoader.
        Returns:
        A keystore used (KeyStore).
        Throws:
        CertificateCoreException - if is not possible to get keystore.
